node_title: As our News feed is currently unavailable here is a reminder from our current PFAIreland aeards ceremony
body:
The prestigious 2014 PFA Ireland Player of the Year Awards took place on Friday 7 November 2014 at the Gibson Hotel, Point Village, Dublin 1.

Awards went to:


Player of the year: Chris Fagan

Young player of the year: Daryl Horgan

2014 Premiere Division Team of the season:

Mark McNulty
Sean Gannon
Andy Boyle
Brian Gartland
Ian Bermingham
Colin Healy
Richie Towell
Daryl Horgan
Patrick Hoban
Chris Fagan
Mark Oâ€™Sullivan
